object.property: Configuring hotkey "hotkeyName" Press the preferred key combination (max. %d keys) to assign to the hotkey.
Sets a new title for the window. This will also affect any cloned window matching the window's id.
Only windows whose classes are part of the preferred/excluded classes list are shown and, if they're empty, all windows are shown.
List of global hotkeys. To change the key combination of a hotkey or disable it use its respective buttons.
